mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.open_id AS "openId", a.menu_no AS "menuNo", a.key AS "key", a.value AS "value", a.type AS "type"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weixin_session_para( id, open_id, menu_no, key, value, type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{openId}, #{menuNo}, #{key}, #{value}, #{type} )
mapper.update: UPDATE weixin_session_para SET open_id = #{openId}, menu_no = #{menuNo}, key = #{key}, value = #{value}, type = #{type} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM weixin_session_para a WHERE a.open_id = #{openId}
